thread.title: Guy and Jules Sebastian's son at first day of school | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Guy and Jules Sebastian's son at first day of school | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Paine For Daily Mail Australia
title: Guy and Jules Sebastian's son at first day of school | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Jules looked chic as usual in a pair of ripped skinny jeans paired with a white striped oversized shirt. She chose comfort with a pair of on-trend black sandals and styled her hair in natural waves. Helping hand: Jules, a stylist and blogger, carried Hunter's bag to his school, slinging the rucksack over one arm while holding her phone at the same time Hot mama! Jules looked chic as usual in a pair of ripped skinny jeans paired with a white striped oversized shirt Jules carried Hunter's bag to his school, slinging the rucksack over one arm while holding her phone at the same time. On Wednesday, the mother-of-two had shared an emotional message with Instagram about her son's big step. Posting a photo of labels she had ordered for his school, Jules wrote: 'Everything he owns. One more sleep till big boy school.' Supportive parents: Guy also accompanied his wife for the school drop off, looking every bit the rock star in ripped blue jeans and lace-up boots Doting dad: While outside the school Guy joked around with his youngest son Archer Rockstar cool: Guy wore a Guns N' Roses T-shirt with a black baseball cap and sunglasses She also added the hashtags 'Not coping' and 'My baby'. Guy also accompanied his wife for the school drop-off, looking every bit the rock star in ripped blue jeans and lace-up boots. He wore a Guns N' Roses T-shirt with a black baseball cap, a pair of metallic sunglasses. Cutie pie: Jules carried the three-year-old Archer, who smiled and giggled as he saw his brother start school Also along to see Hunter off was Guy and Jules' younger son Archer. Jules carried the adorable three-year-old who smiled and giggled as he saw his brother start school. The Australian Idol winner was every bit the doting dad, chatting to and tickling Archer as they stood outside the school. Happy memories! The Sebastians looked every bit the loving family as they saw Hunter off on his first day of 'big boy school' After the school drop-off, an emotional Guy shared a throwback snap of Hunter, taken when he was just a newborn. 'I can't believe this tiny little angel started school today. A small chapter over and a whole new one has begun,' he captioned the photo. 'Didn't think I'd get teary but I may or may not have sprung a little leak. Go Hudson James!'
